content: Unsupported action. Please switch to the desktop mode to fill out PDF forms.

comment.text: This translation key is used for an error message that appears when attempting to fill out a PDF form on a mobile device. It prompts the user to switch to desktop mode to complete the action. The text appears as an info toast notification when the "Start Filling" button is clicked while in mobile mode.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Dəstəklənməyən əməliyyat' is a correct translation of 'Unsupported action', but the overall message could be more user-friendly. A more natural phrasing for Azerbaijani might consider a softer approach.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dəstəklənməyən hərəkət. PDF formalarını doldurmaq üçün, xahiş edirəm masaüstü versiyaya keçin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Xahiş edirəm, PDF formalarını doldurmaq üçün masaüstü rejimə keçin' is grammatically correct, it's a bit formal and literal. A more natural flow would be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Xahiş edirəm, PDF formalarını doldurmaq üçün masaüstü versiyaya keçəsiniz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Unsupported action' is not accurately reflected in the Korean translation. '지원되지 않는 작업입니다' literally means 'Unsupported action,' but a more natural and user-friendly translation might be something like '이 기능은 지원하지 않습니다' (This feature is not supported).
While grammatically correct, the sentence 'PDF 양식을 작성하려면 데스크톱 모드로 전환하십시오' can be slightly more concise. The '하려면' construction can feel a little clunky in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: PDF 양식 작성을 위해 데스크톱 모드로 전환하십시오.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "ການກະທຳແບບນີ້ບໍ່ສາມາດສະຫຼັບໄດ້" is not an accurate translation of 'Unsupported action.' 'ສະຫຼັບໄດ້' implies switching or toggling, which isn't the intended meaning. A better translation would convey that the action isn't supported.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການກະທຳນີ້ບໍ່ສາມາດເຮັດໄດ້

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ປ່ຽນເປັນໂໝດຄອມພິວເຕີ້' translates to 'switch to computer mode'. It could be more accurately phrased to convey 'using a computer'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ໃຊ້ຄອມພິວເຕີ້

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The complete translated sentence lacks the necessary conjunction to link the two clauses smoothly. Adding a conjunction like 'ແລ້ວ' or 'ກໍ' would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການກະທຳນີ້ບໍ່ສາມາດເຮັດໄດ້ ກໍຕ້ອງໃຊ້ຄອມພິວເຕີ້ເພື່ອຕື່ມແບບຟອມ PDF ໄດ້។

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "darbvietas režīmu" is an awkward and inaccurate translation of "desktop mode." A more natural and accurate translation would be "galddatora režīmu".

While the translation is understandable, 'przejdź do trybu desktopowego' is a very literal translation of 'switch to desktop mode'. A more natural and user-friendly phrasing would be 'przejdź do wersji desktopowej' or 'użyj wersji desktopowej'.
The translation 'Treceți la modul desktop' is a bit literal and doesn't flow naturally in Romanian. A more natural phrasing would be 'Utilizați modul desktop' or 'Accesați modul desktop'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Utilizați modul desktop pentru a putea completa formulare PDF.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ක්‍රියාව අනුග්‍රහණය කරන්නේ නැහැ' is a literal translation of 'Unsupported action' and while understandable, it's not the most natural or user-friendly way to express the concept in Sinhala. A more common and understandable phrasing would convey that the action is not possible on the mobile device.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ක්‍රියාව කළ නොහැකියි. (Kriyawa kala nokahiyai.) - 'The action cannot be done.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ඩෙස්ක්ටොප් පරිසරයට මාරු කරන්න' is a bit formal and verbose. While technically correct, a more conversational translation would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඩෙස්ක්ටොප්ට මාරු කරන්න. (Desktop-ta maru kanna.) - 'Switch to desktop.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Although not a critical error, for consistency with the English message, consider adding a period at the end of the Sinhala translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ක්‍රියාව කළ නොහැකියි. ඩෙස්ක්ටොප්ට මාරු කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Neuspešna izvedba dejanja' for 'Unsupported action' is not a direct and clear equivalent. While technically correct, it's a bit clunky and less user-friendly.
The phrase 'preklopite na namizni način' is not the most natural translation for 'switch to the desktop mode'. It's overly literal.

The translation 'Неподржана радња. Молимо пређите на десктоп режим како бисте попунили PDF обрасце.' is a generally accurate translation of 'Unsupported action. Please switch to the desktop mode to fill out PDF forms.' However, a more natural and slightly more precise translation would use 'рачунарски режим' instead of 'десктоп режим'.  'Десктоп режим' is a direct loanword and 'рачунарски режим' conveys the meaning more clearly to a Serbian speaker.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Неподржана радња. Молимо пређите на рачунарски режим како бисте попунили PDF обрасце.
